quest.name: An Unexpected Symphony
journal: Mariorie is making the final preparations for the forthcoming concert.

Mariorie welcomes your arrival, gleefully informing you that the performers have assembled, the instruments have been tuned, and the stage is set for the most magnificent concert the Firmament has seen. After your acquaintances Handeloup and Emmanellain express their eagerness to take part in the event, none other than Lord Francel arrives. Genuinely surprised and deeply touched by the gesture, he states that it would be an honor to perform with you. Make whatever final preparations you must, then join your friends atop the stage.

Thanks to the impressive musical talents of your friends, as well as your diligence in practicing for this moment, the concert proves even more impressive than you could have expected, delighting the guest of honor, your friends, the audience, and all in the Firmament whose ears take in the melodies that now soar through the sky. Satisfied at all you have accomplished today, you return to Mariorie to thank her for her own efforts in making this day possible.

Unsurprisingly, Mariorie is beside herself with joy at seeing the concert prove to be such an unqualified success. She thanks you for all you have done to bring the magic of music to the Firmament, and expresses her hope that you would not be averse to gracing local residents with an encore.
objectives: Speak with Mariorie at Saint Roelle's Dais, and take part in the commemorative concert.

dialogue.name: MARCELLOIX
dialogue.text: What do you think of the instruments? I'll have you know that every single one is homemade by these very hands! I promise you that each was made with painstaking precision.

dialogue.name: CONON
dialogue.text: Yes, I do believe this should make for a good venue...

dialogue.name: MARIORIE
dialogue.text: My apologies for the wait, friend. I am pleased to announce that all preparations are completed, and we are ready for you to take the stage. Your fellow musicians should be arriving any moment, as well...

dialogue.name: HANDELOUP
dialogue.text: Hail, Forename. How goes it? It's quite the honor to have the opportunity to perform with you.

dialogue.name: HANDELOUP
dialogue.text: Recently, I have had the occasion to rest at home with my family, and I have used the time to assist my daughter with her practice. Rest assured that I will not miss a single note.

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: There you are! Did you miss me, old girlboy? When Brother told me about the concert, I knew I simply had to be a part of it. I'm quite the virtuoso with the flute, if you didn't know.

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: Why, I cannot even tell you how long I practiced, that I might win the lovely Laniaitte's heart with a serenade of all her favorite tunes!

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: Hm? What are the two of you doing here? And wearing the same garb, no less... Whatever is the occasion?

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: Foncrineau said you had an urgent matter to discuss with me. Is everything quite all right?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: We have a surprise for you...

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Today, we celebrate the reconstruction.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: A surprise? Could you possibly mean what I think you mean...?

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: A celebration? So that's why everyone has been skulking about the Firmament of late acting oh-so-surreptitious?

dialogue.name: MARIORIE
dialogue.text: Just so, Lord Francel! In celebration of the Firmament's rebirth─and as but a small token of our appreciation for your efforts in leading the restoration─we would announce the establishment of the Risensong Players, the Holy See's first official musical troupe.

dialogue.name: MARIORIE
dialogue.text: And now, without further ado...the stage awaits, my lord!

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: The stage? You mean to say that I am free to join in the performance as well?

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: You are not merely “free,” Lord Francel─why, it is a prerequisite for the performance itself. After all, this performance is being held in your honor first and foremost, and I know as well as any that you'd give anything for a chance to perform with your dearest friends.

dialogue.name: CONON
dialogue.text: Truly, Lord Francel, it is the least we can do to express the depth of our gratitude. Marcelloix, Forename here...each and every man and woman here spared no effort to help make your vision a reality.

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: Why, even my stuffy elder brother was prancing about with a spring in his step when we commissioned him to provide the score for the occasion. You wouldn't want to disappoint him, now, would you?

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: And so here you go. Have yourself a copy of the score in hand and take your place at the piano with Forename here, where you belong.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: Lord Artoirel composed a piece for me? Someone pray pinch my arm, friends, for surely this must be a waking dream...!

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: And that I might perform a duet with you, Forename... I daresay it is only appropriate, as you have been ever my constant partner and invaluable companion throughout this entire effort. It is an honor and a pleasure to share the stage with you, my friend.

dialogue.name: MARIORIE
dialogue.text: The audience is filing in as we speak, and your fellow performers stand by and await your cue. We are prepared to begin as soon as the both of you are ready.

dialogue.name: MARIORIE
dialogue.text: Simply let me know when you are prepared to raise the curtain, and we shall get the show started!

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: Splendid! I, too, shall spend my last few moments tuning my instrument to perfection. Give me a shout as soon as you're ready, old girlboy!

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: I have perused the score, and I do not believe I shall have difficulty doing it justice. And yet, I must confess to feeling a touch anxious about the prospect of taking the stage with you, my friend...

dialogue.name: MARCELLOIX
dialogue.text: Your fellow performers are priming their instruments as we speak. As for the piano, rest assured that it has been tuned with the utmost of precision by yours truly!

dialogue.name: CONON
dialogue.text: We all await your cue, friend. Let us put on the performance of a lifetime and do Lord Francel proud!

dialogue.name: MARIORIE
dialogue.text: Are you prepared, my friend? Then, without further ado, let the show begin!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The troupe will now perform a song. Time your inputs with the on-screen prompts.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
When a blue prompt appears (left), time your input as the diamonds overlap.
When an orange prompt appears (center), make several rapid inputs until the prompt disappears.
When a red prompt appears (right), press and hold the input for the duration of the prompt.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The controls are as follows:

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
Mouse: Left-click or right-click anywhere on screen
Keyboard: Any standard, unmodified key
Please note that chat will be temporarily disabled.ControllerGamepad: All buttons and directional buttons except [???]

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To access the Pause menu, press the escEsc key or [???] button, from which you may choose to end the performance.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Commence the performance?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Let the show begin.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Not quite yet.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Review how to perform.

dialogue.name: MARIORIE
dialogue.text: But of course, my friend. I did not mean to rush you. Whenever you are ready to begin the performance, you need but say the word.

dialogue.name: FRANCEL
dialogue.text: My friend... I have no words to express how deeply that performance moved me. The notes will resonate in my heart for a lifetime...

dialogue.name: MARIORIE
dialogue.text: MistressMaster Forename, thank you for the most lovely performance. It was everything we had hoped it to be and then some.

dialogue.name: MARIORIE
dialogue.text: And from his glowing expression, I have little doubt Lord Francel feels the same. Pray go talk with him, won't you?

dialogue.name: MARIORIE
dialogue.text: And with that, I should start preparing for the inevitable encore performance─to which I hope you would not be averse to taking part. Do stop by whenever you'd like.
